00029 
00030 TrainingAlgorithm::TrainingAlgorithm(ObjectiveFunctional* newObjectiveFunctional)
00031 {
00032    objectiveFunctional = newObjectiveFunctional;
00033 
00034    reserveElapsedTimeHistory = false;
00035    reserveFreeParametersHistory = false;
00036    reserveFreeParametersNormHistory = false;
00037    reserveEvaluationHistory = false;
00038    reserveGradientHistory = false;
00039    reserveGradientNormHistory = false;
00040 
00041    warningFreeParametersNorm = 10000.0;
00042    warningGradientNorm = 1000.0;
00043    
00044    display = true;
00045 }
00046 
00047 
00048 // DEFAULT CONSTRUCTOR
00049 
00051 
00052 TrainingAlgorithm::TrainingAlgorithm(void)
00053 {
00054    objectiveFunctional = NULL;
00055 
00056    reserveFreeParametersHistory = false;
00057    reserveFreeParametersNormHistory = false;
00058    reserveEvaluationHistory = false;
00059    reserveGradientHistory = false;
00060    reserveGradientNormHistory = false;
00061    reserveElapsedTimeHistory = false;
00062 
00063    warningFreeParametersNorm = 1000.0;
00064    warningGradientNorm = 1000.0;
00065 
00066    display = true;   
00067 }

00348 // void setGradientNormGoal(double) method
00349 
00356 
00357 void TrainingAlgorithm::setGradientNormGoal(double newGradientNormGoal)
00358 {
00359    // Control sentence (if debug)
00360 
00361    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00362 
00363    if(newGradientNormGoal < 0.0)
00364    {
00365       std::cerr << std::endl
00366                 << "Flood Error: TrainingAlgorithm class." << std::endl
00367                 << "void setGradientNormGoal(double) method." << std::endl
00368                 << "Gradient norm goal must be equal or greater than 0." << std::endl 
00369                 << std::endl;
00370 
00371       exit(1);
00372    }
00373 
00374    #endif
00375 
00376    // Set gradient norm goal
00377 
00378    gradientNormGoal = newGradientNormGoal;
00379 }

00382 // void setMaximumTime(double) method
00383 
00389 
00390 void TrainingAlgorithm::setMaximumTime(double newMaximumTime)
00391 {
00392    // Control sentence (if debug)
00393 
00394    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00395 
00396    if(newMaximumTime <= 0.0)
00397    {
00398       std::cerr << std::endl 
00399                 << "Flood Error: TrainingAlgorithm class." << std::endl
00400                 << "void setMaximumTime(double) method." << std::endl
00401                 << "Maximum time must be greater than 0." << std::endl
00402                 << std::endl;
00403 
00404       exit(1);
00405    }
00406    
00407    #endif
00408 
00409    // Set maximum time
00410 
00411    maximumTime = newMaximumTime;
00412 }

00424 void TrainingAlgorithm::setMinimumImprovement(double newMinimumImprovement)
00425 {
00426    // Control sentence (if debug)
00427 
00428    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00429 
00430    if(newMinimumImprovement < 0.0)
00431    {
00432       std::cerr << std::endl 
00433                 << "Flood Error: TrainingAlgorithm class." << std::endl
00434                 << "void setMinimumImprovement(double) method." << std::endl
00435                 << "Minimum improvement must be equal or greater than 0." << std::endl
00436                 << std::endl;
00437 
00438       exit(1);
00439    }
00440 
00441    #endif
00442 
00443    // Set minimum improvement
00444 
00445    minimumImprovement = newMinimumImprovement;
00446 }
